rooms.description: A welcoming space that aligns with Vastu principles by facilitating good energy flow.

This combined space features modern design elements, abundant natural light through large windows on the south or east wall, an island counter for functionality, and ample seating area. The layout considers Vastu guidelines by positioning the kitchen in a favorable direction.
A spacious master bedroom with ample natural light and ventilation, ideally positioned to align with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow and privacy.
A comfortable secondary bedroom designed for relaxation. Its placement adheres to Vastu considerations ensuring a peaceful environment.
Modern bathroom facilities integrated into the design with efficient use of space and proper ventilation as per local norms.

openings.location: main entrance on ground floor facing east or north to invite positive energy, consistent with Vastu.
open-plan kitchen and living area, south and west walls for natural light while balancing thermal comfort.
attached to the side of the building for easy access from ground floor, ensuring efficient traffic flow and adherence to local norms.

additional_features.description: A well-designed two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan with separate access from the main house to maintain privacy and security.

additional_features.location: adjacent to the master bedroom or living area, designed for an open view that aligns with Vastu principles of positive energy flow.
